Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Stick#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
